description: We offer service storage of fruits and vegetables in high-class storage chambers, in a controlled atmosphere (temperature, relative humidity, storage atmosphere composition).

We have the ability to sort selected fruits and vegetables by size, weight, color, and quality, using water unloading, hydro vacuum filler, and a 26-channel water system, which allows apples to be divided into selected categories.
Available packaging: foil bags, cardboard packaging (bushel), wooden crates, plastic crates, pallet boxes.
We offer transport of fruits and vegetables using refrigerated vehicles, with the ability to maintain a constant temperature within the specified range.
